textAfterTable: Sizing Guide Sizing Shoes In order to ensure the most accurate fit please use the measuring guide located to the right to measure your bust, waist, hips, and length if desired when ordering your dress. Take these measurements and compare them to the individual sizing located in the "Measurements" tab of each of the product descriptions.  Use a fabric measuring tape and measure the following parts of your body: *Bust: Measure the fullest part of your bust. *Waist: Measure the smallest part of your natural waist. Approximately right above your belly button. *Hips: Measure the fullest part of your hips. Including your bottom. International customers please note: All of our sizing charts are in inches, so you will need to convert centimeters into inches. International shoe chart Unique Vintage welcome customers from around the world! Please use the size conversion chart to find your US size and come shopping. US, CAN AU EUR JP UK
